activity_1_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වචන නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_d.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_e.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

content.sentence_text: He always t'ur'ns off the main switch before he starts.
The wire b'ur'ns if it is loose.
The main technician s'er'vices all the fridges on Mondays.
This w'or'ker always repairs broken circuits promptly.

activity_2.focus: Simple Present - third person singular , Nationalities

example.text:
Listen to the model dialogue.
ආදර්ශ සංවාදයට සවන් දෙන්න.
மாதிரி உரையாடலை கேளுங்கள்.

activity_2_a.text:
Match the capital cities to the nationalities.
රාජධානී නගර ජාතිකත්වයන්ට ගැලපෙන්න.
மாநகரங்களையும் தேசியத்துவங்களையும் பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_2_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_2_d.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

activity_2_e.text:
Listen to each question, use the pause to answer it, then compare your response with the model answer.
සෑම ප්‍රශ්නයකටම සවන් දෙන්න, පිළිතුරු දීමට විරාමය භාවිතා කරන්න, ඉන්පසු ඔබේ පිළිතුර ආදර්ශ පිළිතුර සමඟ සසඳන්න.
ஒவ்வொரு கேள்வியையும் கேட்டு, இடைவெளியைப் பயன்படுத்தி பதிலளியுங்கள். பின்னர் உங்கள் பதிலை மாதிரி பதிலுடன் ஒப்பிடுங்கள்.

example_dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does he do every day?
example_dialogues.text_h: He eats Sri Lankan food, he watches Sri Lankan movies, and he listens to Sri Lankan news.

example_dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does she do every day?
example_dialogues.text_h: She eats Chinese food, she watches Chinese movies, and she listens to Chinese news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does she do every day?
dialogues.text_h: She eats Japanese food, she watches Japanese movies, and she listens to Japanese news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does he do every day?
dialogues.text_h: He eats Russian food, he watches Russian movies, and he listens to Russian news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does he do every day?
dialogues.text_h: He eats Omani food, he watches Omani movies, and he listens to Omani news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does she do every day?
dialogues.text_h: She eats Pakistani  food,  she watches Pakistani movies, and she listens to Pakistani news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does he do every day?
dialogues.text_h: He eats German food, he watches German movies, and he listens to German news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does she do every day?
dialogues.text_h: She eats French food, she watches French movies, and she listens to French news.

activity_a.text:
Choose the correct answer.
 නිවැරදි පිළිතුර තෝරන්න.
 சரியான பதிலைத் தேர்ந்தெடுக்கவும்.

activity_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

examples.sentence: Which sentence best describes the role of an electrician?
options: He installs circuit breakers and distribution boards.
He polishes circuit breakers and distribution boards.
He ignores circuit breakers and distribution boards.
examples.answer: He installs circuit breakers and distribution boards.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the role of an electrician?
options: He diagnoses faults in wiring systems.
He paints faults in wiring systems.
He hides faults in wiring systems.
content.answer: He diagnoses faults in wiring systems.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the role of an electrician?
options: He ensures proper grounding of cables.
He removes proper grounding of cables.
He ignores proper grounding of cables.
content.answer: He ensures proper grounding of cables.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the role of an electrician?
options: He calibrates electrical panels to maintain voltage levels.
He damages electrical panels to maintain voltage levels.
He washes electrical panels to maintain voltage levels.
content.answer: He calibrates electrical panels to maintain voltage levels.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the role of an electrician?
options: He replaces worn-out fuses safely.
He damages worn-out fuses.
He ignores worn-out fuses completely.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the role of an electrician?
options: He tests insulation with specialized measuring tools.
He ignores insulation with specialized measuring tools.
He paints insulation with specialized measuring tools.
content.answer: He tests insulation with specialized measuring tools.

activity_b.text: He tests insulation with specialized measuring tools.
He replaces worn-out fuses safely.
He calibrates electrical panels to maintain voltage levels.
He ensures proper grounding of cables.
He diagnoses faults in wiring systems.
He installs circuit breakers and distribution boards.

activity_a.text:
Listen to the audio which will be played twice and click on the correct answer. It is very important that you read the questions before you listen to the recording.
ඔබට සෑම පටිගත කිරීමක්ම දෙවරක් ඇසෙනු ඇත. නිවැරදි පිළිතුර ක්ලික් කරන්න. රෙකෝඩින් එක අහන්නට පෙර ප්‍රශ්නය කියවීම ඉතාමත් වැදගත්ය.
ஒவ்வொரு ஒலிப்பதிவையும் நீங்கள் இருமுறை கேட்கலாம். கேட்ட எண்களை குறித்து எழுதுங்கள். பதிவைக் கேட்பதற்கு முன் கேள்விகளைப் படிப்பது மிகவும் முக்கியம்.

activity_b.text:
Listen.
கேளுங்கள்.
සවන් දෙන්න.

activity_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_d.text: Read along. පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න. ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

Questions.question: What does Arun do first?
Questions.answer: He checks the duty schedule and gathers tools.
options: He checks the duty schedule and gathers tools.
He paints the workshop wall.
He repairs tyres.

Questions.question: What does he often replace?
options: A socket.
A blown fuse.
A transformer.

Questions.question: What tool does he use to test insulation?
options: He uses a torque wrench.
He uses a megger.
He uses a hammer.

Questions.question: Where does he note the readings?
options: On the wall chart.
In the logbook.
In the toolbox.

Questions.question: What does he always do before leaving?
Questions.answer: He switches off the power and cleans the bench.
options: He leaves the power on.
He forgets the tools.
He switches off the power and cleans the bench.

activity_b.text: Arun is an electrical trainee at the training workshop.
He works in the wiring section every day.
He usually starts at eight o’clock sharp.
He checks the duty schedule, gathers his insulated pliers, and sets up the multimeter.
He always follows the electrical safety checklist.
Arun inspects the distribution board, the circuit breakers, and the fuses.
He checks the wiring connections and tests the earthing.
He often replaces a blown fuse or tightens a loose terminal.
He sometimes installs new sockets and switches when required.
He never forgets to check the insulation resistance with the megger.
During every routine, Arun connects the multimeter, records the voltage, and verifies the current flow.
He also tests the lighting circuits and ensures the proper function of the switches.
He explains the readings to his instructor and notes them in the logbook.
At the end of the day, Arun switches off the power supply, stores the tools in the cabinet, and cleans the workbench.
He always makes sure that the area is safe before leaving.
Arun enjoys his training because he develops precision and learns responsibility.

At the end of the day, Arun switches off the power supply, stores the tools in the cabinet, and cleans the workbench.
